entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
